name: PartyBid Microcosm #22
description:
# **PartyBid Microcosm #22 NFT** 
 This image commemorates the **Party Of The Living Dead PartyBid** on August 6th, 2021. Cryptopunk 2066 was purchased for 1144.5 $ETH by 457 wallets via [partybid.app](https://partybid.app) on [punks.house](https://punks.house). 
 $DEAD tokens were issued to all wallets that contributed to the purchase. 
 
 --- 
 #### References: 
 [Cryptopunks by Larva Labs](https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks/details/2066) 
 
 [Punks.house by Zora](https://punks.house/punk/2066): 
 Lets any Cryptopunk to list their Cryptopunk for a reserve-timed auction. See [contract](https://etherscan.io/token/0xb7F7F6C52F2e2fdb1963Eab30438024864c313F6?a=2066). 
 
 [PartyBid by PartyDao](https://www.partybid.app/party/0x2912F57F93dD69FBbF477B616D6f8C34C49bb282): See [contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x2912F57F93dD69FBbF477B616D6f8C34C49bb282). 
 
 [Fractional.art](https://fractional.art): 
 Fractional enables NFT owners to discover the market value of their held assets and create liquidity events by tokenizing their assets, like this [Vault](https://fractional.art/vaults/0x0C7060BF06a78AAAAB3fac76941318A52a3F4613). 
 
 **Contract on Etherscan:** [PartyBid Punk#2066](https://etherscan.io/address/0x0C7060BF06a78AAAAB3fac76941318A52a3F4613).
